name: Beach break - Made for ICDJam
description:
My second game! This time made for the "I Can't Draw But Want To Make A Game (Again)" jam int the span of 2 weeks.

Beach break is a turn based strategy tiny game, a really short one (it's made in 2 weeks sorry if it is too small >.<) where one character is trying to scape from a beach city facing his pursuers and all the dangers in his way (history unfinished but you have a bite of it :P).

Controls:

- W: Heavy attack

- A: Light attack / skip cutscene

- D: Cheer (Help your allies when they are out of energies :D)

- S: Defend (Let someone else in your team deal with your problems >:D)

- Space: Choose enemy/ally

-Esc: Change attack (just in case you choose an option that you did not want)

Background music by: Existential Worker by Martijn de Boer (NiGiD) (c) copyright 2020 Licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution Noncommercial  (3.0) license. http://dig.ccmixter.org/files/NiGiD/61405 Ft: Javolenus
